DOC.brief_summary: The purpose of this study is to determine whether stimulation to the akupressurpoint P6 with a recently developed bracelet are effective preventing postoperative nausea and vomiting
DOC.brief_title: Prevention of Postoperative Nausea and Vomiting (PONV) by Acupressure
DOC.criteria: Female, Nonsmoker, >18 years, ASA 1 or 2, Signed patient information, IVanaestesia. Male, Smoker, ASA 3 or 4, Pregnancy, Nausea and vomiting within the last 24 h before operation, Diabetes, Carpaltunnel syndrome, Lymphedema of arms, Eczema of forearm, Patients who earlier has undergone removal of lymph nodes in the armpits, Inhalation anaestesia.
